dict.acceptation: 倾斜；有斜度；悄悄地走；潜行；

sent.orig: SLOPE: This shows a vertical profile of your flight if you are flying an ILS.
sent.trans: SLOPE:当你在飞ILS的时候，显示出一个垂直的轮廓。

sent.orig: The similarity of slope communities-facing slope communities was higher and it was thesouth-facing slope and slope.
sent.trans: 植物群落演替初期坡顶和阴坡的群落相似性较大，而阳坡和坡底植物群落相似性较大。

sent.orig: Three lithofacies assemblages of upper slope, lower slope and submarine fan emerged in the slope.
sent.trans: 在这个斜坡背景中出现了上斜坡相、下斜坡相与海底扇相等3种类型的岩相组合。

sent.orig: Thegeometric design demand of fore slope, back slope, cross slope, and ditch clear zone were studied.
sent.trans: 针对路侧净区的前坡、后坡、横坡、排水沟等具体组成，分别研究了其几何设计要求。

sent.orig: Smooth blasting of slope excavation would inevitably bring on damnification of slope remaining rock mass.
sent.trans: 边坡开挖爆破必然造成边坡保留岩体的损伤。
